## Pro Tip: Let AI Customize

Instead of manually copying templates, tell your AI:

```
Read the AGENTS.md template from https://ai-first-dev-kit.github.io/templates/agents-md/ 
and create one for this project, customized with our actual tech stack and patterns.
```

Your AI will:
1. Read the template from this site
2. Analyze your project's actual structure
3. Generate a customized version
